release.notes:
This is the PRC Compton version as denoted by the "26" on labels and" PRC-C" in runouts.

Labels read: Polygram Radio & Store Sampler; Promotion Only - Not For Sale; tracks A1, B1 credited to 'The Suburbs'; A5 credited to 'The Style Council', but not track B4.

Runouts are etched, STERLING stamped.
